lore.text: Summoner of the Stardust Pillar boss

wiki_components.text: Mystical creature that summons the Stardust Pillar boss.
Upon defeat, it drops valuable mid-game resources
along with a Stardust Dungeon Key
the shield around the boss will be lowered after 50 enemies are killed near it
(+15 kills required per player in the area, capped at 150)
Then, the pillar will start to move like a normal wither
with more health and damage while still summoning mobs

lore.text: One-time use key for the Stardust Dungeon

wiki_components.text: Key that allows access to the Stardust Dungeon.
Obtained by defeating the Stardust Pillar boss
Once used, the key will be consumed
Inside the dungeon, face challenging enemies and traps
